title: Raoul Wallenberg: between the lines [Edited version]
creator_credit: Karin Altmann, Bob Weis and Jethro Films Pty Ltd
brief_description: The story of Raoul Wallenberg, a Swedish diplomat living in wartime Budapest who displayed outstanding courage and ingenuity in rescuing Jews from the holocaust. An edited version of the 80 minute feature length documentary.
creator_credit_for_label: Karin Altmann, Bob Weis and Jethro Films Pty Ltd
description: The story of Raoul Wallenberg, a Swedish diplomat living in wartime Budapest who displayed outstanding courage and ingenuity in rescuing Jews from the holocaust. An edited version of the 80 minute feature length documentary.
